cartoonistGameXML.winText: Remove all of mushrooms from the screen.
cartoonistGameXML.recipes:
Win: Remove all of mushrooms from the screen.
Lose: When turtles gets too small.
cartoonistGameXML.gameConclusion: Having played this game, there is something you may have learned.
cartoonistGameXML.conceptMapSummary: A game where plumber eats mushrooms, plumber kills turtles, plumber collects coins, plumber saves princess and turtles kills plumber.
